sentence: salesforce.com, inc. (NYSE: CRM ) is adding 800 employees to its workforce.
The "beat and raise" may sound like a perverse new-age dance move, and while it isn't a dance move (yet), CRM stock owners will be excused for dancing in the streets today.
The company announced that will be build on its continued success in the technology industry by expanding.
In addition to the workers joining salesforce.com, the company is also moving.
The San Francisco-based website is moving to Indianapolis, a growing area of technology in the country.
Salesforce is making a $40 million commitment over a decade for these plans, which include the addition of these workers over the next five years.
